name: queasiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the feeling of wanting to vomit: Apart from a slight queasiness, physically he felt quite fit. Her queasiness was beginning to pass.
a feeling of being worried, unhappy, or uncertain about something: Did you feel any queasiness over the way the demonstrations were suppressed? There is a general public queasiness about genetically modified crops. See
queasy
More examplesFewer examplesShe felt a faint queasiness in the mornings.A wave of queasiness hit me.As she waited outside his office, she felt the familiar queasiness.The ending of the story was so dark it left me with a nagging sense of queasiness and despair.
